description: Streamlined communication management for your business! Supermoon empowers you to deliver exceptional client support, build enduring customer relationships, and save time.
title: E-Commerce & Customer Service Communication Management Software
introduction: Supermoon is an AI-powered helpdesk platform designed to simplify customer support by integrating various communication channels like Gmail, Outlook, Instagram, and website chat into a single shared inbox. It aims to cut response times in half and enhance team collaboration with features like personalized AI, Smart Replies, and internal comments.
features: Omnichannel inbox for Gmail, Outlook, Instagram, and website chat
Smart Replies to save time on customer messages
Ticketing system with tags, priority settings, and status changes
targetPeople: Businesses looking to streamline customer support and improve team collaboration

faqs.question: How do I get the most out of my Supermoon team?
faqs.answer: Start by connecting your Gmail or Outlook inbox in your settings. Personalize your AI by submitting your FAQ information and invite your teammates to collaborate in the shared inbox.

faqs.question: Whatâ€™s the difference between the Gmail/Outlook integration and email forwarding?
faqs.answer: Integrations allow you to connect your inbox in seconds, mirroring your Supermoon inbox. Forwarding is for aliases or distribution lists without unique login credentials.

faqs.question: When would I forward email as opposed to using the inbox integrations?
faqs.answer: Forwarding is used when you cannot change your existing inbox from an alias or distribution list to an actual user account. Integrations are recommended for unique user accounts.

faqs.question: What are Smart Replies and how do they save my team time?
faqs.answer: Smart Replies generate draft messages in seconds, saving time on every customer message.

faqs.question: How do I personalize my AI and what does that mean for me?
faqs.answer: Customize your AI with your business information like return policy and business hours. The AI will use this info in Smart Reply drafts to save you more time.

faqs.question: What are the differences in the plans and what is recommended for my team?
faqs.answer: The Free plan offers basic features with a limit of 5 teammates and 90 days of message history. The Starter plan includes unlimited teammates and personalized AI with a limit on Smart Replies. The Pro plan offers unlimited AI features and additional top-level features.
